mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (reply_num, post_num, reply_content, reply_id) VALUES (reply_num.nextval, #{post_num}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET reply_content = #{reply_content}, update_date = SYSDATE WHERE reply_num = #{reply_num}
mapper.select: SELECT post_num FROM reply WHERE reply_num = #{reply_num}
